name: Entitled Roguelike Project (ERP)
description:
The year is 2269, you awaken in a dark sewer and recall the events that just occurred; you were walking your cat, Fluffles, at the downtown's bridge of a large metropolitan city. A dark van with tinted windows drove by, stopped, and heavily armed and armored people hopped out. Moments later the cat was snatched and you were shoved off the bridge.

It's time to get your cat back.
